verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they <S%H3947>take<s%> for me an <S%H8641>offering<s%>: of every <S%H376>man<s%> whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> maketh him <S%H5068>willing<s%> ye shall <S%H3947>take<s%> my <S%H8641>offering<s%>.
And this is the <S%H8641>offering<s%> which ye shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of <S%H2091>them<s%>: gold, and <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H5178>brass<s%>,
and <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8438>scarlet<s%>, and fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and <S%H5795>goats<s%>' hair,
and <S%H352>rams<s%>' <S%H5785>skins<s%> dyed <S%H119>red<s%>, <S%H8476>and<s%> <S%H5785>sealskins<s%>, and <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>,
oil <S%H8081><s%> for the <S%H3974>light<s%>, <S%H1314>spices<s%> for the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and for the <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%>,
onyx <S%H7718><s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>, and <S%H68>stones<s%> to be <S%H4394>set<s%>, for the <S%H646>ephod<s%>, and for the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%>.
And let them <S%H6213>make<s%> me a <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>, that I may <S%H7931>dwell<s%> among <S%H8432>them<s%>.

According to all that I <S%H7200>show<s%> <S%H8403>thee<s%>, the pattern of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of all the <S%H3627>furniture<s%> <S%H6213>thereof<s%>, even so shall ye make it.

And they shall <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>: two <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H520>thereof<s%>, and a cubit and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H520>thereof<s%>, and a cubit and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the height <S%H6967>thereof<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, <S%H1004>within<s%> and <S%H2351>without<s%> shalt thou <S%H6823>overlay<s%> <S%H6213>it<s%>, and shalt make upon it a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3332>cast<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for <S%H5414>it<s%>, and put them in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6471>feet<s%> <S%H8147>thereof<s%>; and two <S%H2885>rings<s%> shall be on the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of <S%H8147>it<s%>, and two <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the other side of <S%H8145>it<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H905>staves<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H935>put<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> into the <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H6763>sides<s%> of the <S%H727>ark<s%>, wherewith to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%>.
The <S%H905>staves<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H2885>rings<s%> of the <S%H727>ark<s%>: they shall not be taken from <S%H5493>it<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> into the <S%H727>ark<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> which I shall give <S%H5414>thee<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H3727>mercy-seat<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>: two <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H520>thereof<s%>, and a cubit and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the breadth <S%H7341>thereof<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>; of beaten <S%H4749>work<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8147>them<s%>, at the two <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H3727>mercy-seat<s%>.

And <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> at the one <S%H7098>end<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> at the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H7098>end<s%>: of one piece with the <S%H3727>mercy-seat<s%> shall ye <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> on the <S%H8147>two<s%> ends <S%H7098>thereof<s%>.

And the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> out their <S%H3671>wings<s%> on <S%H4605>high<s%>, <S%H5526>covering<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy-seat<s%> with their <S%H3671>wings<s%>, with their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another<s%>; toward the <S%H3727>mercy-seat<s%> shall the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of the cherubim <S%H3742>be<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy-seat<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> upon the <S%H727>ark<s%>; and in the <S%H727>ark<s%> thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> that I shall give <S%H5414>thee<s%>.

And there I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> with <S%H1696>thee<s%>, and I will commune with thee from above the <S%H3727>mercy-seat<s%>, from <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> which are <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, of all things which I will give thee in <S%H6680>commandment<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>: two <S%H520>cubits<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H520>thereof<s%>, and a cubit the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H520>thereof<s%>, and a cubit and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the height <S%H6967>thereof<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H6213>make<s%> thereto a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> unto it a <S%H4526>border<s%> of a <S%H2948>handbreadth<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2213>crown<s%> to the <S%H4526>border<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> for it <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H2885>rings<s%> in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6285>corners<s%> that are on the <S%H702>four<s%> feet <S%H7272>thereof<s%>.
Close <S%H5980><s%> by the <S%H4526>border<s%> shall the <S%H2885>rings<s%> <S%H1004>be<s%>, for places for the <S%H905>staves<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, that the <S%H7979>table<s%> may be borne with <S%H5375>them<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H7086>dishes<s%> <S%H3709>thereof<s%>, and the spoons <S%H7184>thereof<s%>, and the flagons <S%H4518>thereof<s%>, and the bowls <S%H2004>thereof<s%>, wherewith to <S%H5258>pour<s%> <S%H2889>out<s%>: of pure <S%H2091>gold<s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213>them<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H5414>set<s%> upon the <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H3899>showbread<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me <S%H8548>alway<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>: of beaten <S%H4749>work<s%> shall the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> be <S%H6213>made<s%>, even its <S%H7070>base<s%>, and its <S%H3409>shaft<s%>; its <S%H1375>cups<s%>, its <S%H3730>knops<s%>, and its <S%H6525>flowers<s%>, shall be of one piece with it:

and there shall be <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> <S%H3318>going<s%> out of the <S%H6654>sides<s%> <S%H7969>thereof<s%>; three <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> out of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6654>side<s%> <S%H7969>thereof<s%>, and three <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> out of the <S%H8145>other<s%> side <S%H6654>thereof<s%>:

three <S%H7969><s%> <S%H1375>cups<s%> made like <S%H8246>almond-blossoms<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>branch<s%>, a <S%H3730>knop<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower<s%>; and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1375>cups<s%> made like <S%H8246>almond-blossoms<s%> in the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H7070>branch<s%>, a <S%H3730>knop<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower<s%>: so for the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> <S%H3318>going<s%> out of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>:
and in the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1375>cups<s%> made like <S%H8246>almond-blossoms<s%>, the <S%H3730>knops<s%> <S%H6525>thereof<s%>, and the flowers thereof;

and a <S%H3730>knop<s%> under <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of one piece with <S%H3730>it<s%>, and a knop under <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of one piece with <S%H3730>it<s%>, and a knop under <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of one piece with <S%H8337>it<s%>, for the six <S%H7070>branches<s%> <S%H3318>going<s%> out of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>.
Their <S%H3730>knops<s%> and their <S%H7070>branches<s%> shall be of one piece with <S%H259>it<s%>; the whole of it one beaten <S%H4749>work<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H7651>thereof<s%>, seven: and they shall <S%H5927>light<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H215>thereof<s%>, to give light over <S%H5676>against<s%> <S%H6440>it<s%>.
And the <S%H4457>snuffers<s%> <S%H4289>thereof<s%>, and the snuffdishes <S%H2889>thereof<s%>, shall be of pure <S%H2091>gold<s%>.
Of a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> shall it be <S%H6213>made<s%>, with all these <S%H3627>vessels<s%>.
And <S%H7200>see<s%> that thou <S%H6213>make<s%> them after their <S%H8403>pattern<s%>, which hath been <S%H7200>showed<s%> thee in the <S%H2022>mount<s%>.
